name: Magic Groundwork (working title)
description:
this is an early build of my metroidvania game.

controls:

wasd/arrow keys to move (you can use space to jump)

left mouse button to use sword

shift to use abilities (once you have one)

if the world ends somewhere don't go there, you will get stuck falling for ever.

if you find a bug or something please tell me what happend in the comments
